---
name: work-on-next
description: work on the next atomic task in the plan
---

Using the [plan](../../opensnipping/plan.md) as guidance, identify the next atomic task to work on. Ensure that the task is logically cohesive and can be verified by a simple test or manual check. Once identified, proceed to implement the task following the established work principles and categories.

- implement
- compile
- test
- ask for commit or push approval
